lead_paragraph: Mexican Formula One Grand Prix organizers say Sunday's race attracted an even bigger crowd than in 2015, bucking a trend of lower attendances in an event's second year after the novelty has worn off.

headline.print_headline: Mexico GP Organizers 'Blown Away' by Crowd Numbers
headline.main: Mexico GP Organizers 'Blown Away' by Crowd Numbers

snippet: Mexican Formula One Grand Prix organizers say Sunday's race attracted an even bigger crowd than in 2015, bucking a trend of lower attendances in an event's second year after the novelty has worn off....
